sect1.para: Below is the list of advisories applicable to the NetBSD 3.0 release:

itemizedlist.listitem:
A description and resolution procedure for Malicious PPP options can overrun a kernel buffer can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2006-019

A description and resolution procedure for sail(6), dm(8) and tetris(6) buffer overflows can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2006-018

A description and resolution procedure for Sendmail malformed multipart MIME messages can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2006-017

A description and resolution procedure for IPv6 socket options can crash the system can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2006-016

A description and resolution procedure for FPU Information leak on i386/amd64/Xen platforms with AMD CPUs can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2006-015

A description and resolution procedure for An audio subsystem race condition may crash the system can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2006-014

A description and resolution procedure for sysctl(3) local denial of service can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2006-013

A description and resolution procedure for SIOCGIFALIAS ioctl may cause system crash can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2006-012

A description and resolution procedure for IPSec replay attack can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2006-011

A description and resolution procedure for Sendmail race condition can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2006-010

A description and resolution procedure for False detection of Intel hardware RNG can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2006-009

A description and resolution procedure for Malformed ELF interpreter causes system crash can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2006-008

A description and resolution procedure for mail(1) creates record file with insecure umask can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2006-007

A description and resolution procedure for bridge memory disclosure can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2006-005

A description and resolution procedure for Denial of services issues with pf can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2006-004
